1.12

* Added option to disable mouse wheel volume control. It caused performance drop on certain systems
* Fixed a bug with mouse wheel volume control (jumped back to 100 after reaching 0)
* Fixed a text centering bug when iconic background was enabled, and no album art was found

* Album art is taken directly from Winamp, supports more formats
* Added scrolling text and a new text formatting flag that prevents scrolling text
* Added 'Apply' button on config window
